entry.title: 3M SB24252 - Scotch-Brite Surface Conditioning Disc Tn Quick Change, 7 in x No Hole A Vfn, Sb24252 7000120960
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 6.21

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Surface Conditioning Disc TN Quick Change, 7 in x NH A VFN, 25 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ Surface Conditioning Disc comes in a wide variety of grades and sizes and is an ideal first step for cleaning, blending, deburring, and finishing
  • The disc's durable, non-woven fibre construction conforms well on irregular or contoured surfaces without undercutting or damaging the base material, and the open web construction resists loading
  • This popular abrasive is available with aluminum oxide and silicon carbide minerals.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Ideal first step for cleaning, finishing, blending, and light deburring jobs
  • Conformable disc conditions surfaces without gouging, undercutting, or damaging the base material
  • Available in a variety of abrasive types (aluminum oxide or silicon carbide), grades, and sizes
  • Suitable for use on metal, composite, plastics, and other materials
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB04188 - Scotch-Brite High Strength Disc, 6 in x 1/2 in A Med, 1 Sb04188 7000120949
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 5.53

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite High Strength Disc, 6 in x 1/2 in A MED, 100 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ High Strength Disc is a general purpose disc made of a durable, tough web of non-woven nylon fibres and abrasive mineral
  • It is designed to effectively clean, deburr, denib/defuzz, and achieve satin finishes
  • The disc's open web construction resists loading and runs cool to keep the aluminum oxide abrasive cutting at a consistent rate throughout the life of the disc.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Durable open-web disc deburrs, denibs/defuzz, and cleans a wide variety of metals
  • Conformable disc with wear-resistant edge provides consistent finishes and long disc life
  • Can be stacked to expand use or cover larger surface areas
  • Load resistance extends cut rate throughout the life of the disc
  • Tough, non-woven material allows heavy-duty use
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB18477 - Scotch-Brite Se Surface Conditioning Disc, 7 in x No Hole A Med, Sb18477 7000120881
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 6.19

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite SE Surface Conditioning Disc, 7 in x NH A MED, 25 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ SE Surface Conditioning Disc achieves an aggressive cut, making it good for performing heavy-duty deburring and finishing
  • Its heavy-duty, non-woven fibre construction conforms well to irregular or contoured surfaces and helps preserve edges
  • This disc includes a hook and loop attachment system.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Provides extra cut and longer life than SC and PD Surface Conditioning discs for heavy duty deburring and finishing
  • High, fast cutting yet conformable disc is ideal for edge deburring
  • Conformability combined with secure, hook and loop attachment provides aggressive cutting without damaging the base material
  • Open-web construction resists loading and runs cool, allowing for consistent finishes
  • 3M Hookit attachment system offers quick and easy disc change-out for multi-step finishing processes
    		•

entry.title: 3M SB00667 - Scotch-Brite Light Deburring Disc, 6 in x 1/4 in A Vfn, 1 Sb00667 7000120857
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 2.05

[shortdesc]

Scotch-Brite Light Deburring Disc, 6 in x 1/4 in A VFN, 100 per case

  • The Scotch-Brite™ Light Deburring Disc is a very fine grade disc ideal for lightweight deburring and finishing on all types of metals
  • Moderately conformable, this disc's dense web construction offers increased wear resistance and extended use for applications that require a less aggressive cut, such as cleaning and surface finishing.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Very fine grade durable disc is ideal for lightweight deburring, cleaning and finishing
  • Open-web construction resists loading and runs cool, producing consistent finishes
  • Non-woven sheet conditions surfaces without affecting the geometry of the workpiece
  • Load resistant open web construction and excellent durability provide extended use
  • Discs can be used individually or stacked on a straight shaft tool or bench motor for a broader cleaning edge
  • Excellent on bench motors and straight shaft tools
